Title: Ako Shergazy | Personal Website
Name: Ako Shergazy
Description: Junior at Bennington College (VT, US). Passionate about Sound Design, Music Composition, and Music Technology.
I grab every chance I get to travel, learn and create.
AboutContent: Ako was born and raised in Kyrgyzstan, and after graduating from Aichurok High School she moved to the US to pursue her bachelor’s degree at Bennington College where she is double majoring in Audio Engineering and Composition. Ako’s works include compositions for solo piano, string quartet, sound design, and film scoring for moving images. She also has a set of songs she worked on as an audio engineer and mixer.

Ako Shergazy’s professional experience varies from music education to audio & video engineering. In summer 2019 Ako worked at one of the Fresh Air Fund’s camps as a Music Technology specialist and educator. Following that summer, she was responsible for Bennington College’s recording studio and for assisting students with troubleshooting. For her winter internship, Ako went back to Kyrgyzstan and worked as a Live Audio & Video Intern at Radio Liberty in Bishkek. In summer 2020 she picked up an intern position at Chelsea Music Festival where she performs as Audio & Video Engineer.
